ygData.subject: Karana Lambent Trading
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, this may well not be the appropriate forum for this, and if so, I apologize. While doing my own lambent quests, our group picked up extra
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone, this may well not be the appropriate forum for this, and if so, I apologize.

While doing my own lambent quests, our group picked up extra components for both lambent boots and
lambent arms. (Both are amazing items btw)

If your group on Karana did something similar with other lambent items and you're interested in
trading, let me know.

As a side note, and also as a feeble attempt to make this more general-bard related.... while killing
hill giants to get lambent stones, my group was rather shocked to discover that killing two giants
was actually easier than killing one, thanks to Solon's Song of the Sirens.

Except when a cyclops joined the fray as well. :)

Jyzan
